name: GreenPointSystems
0:
”Alexa, turn on the main light”
”Alexa, activate the party scenario”
”Alexa, Turn off my room please”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Operate your Green Point system using your voice. 

This skill requires you to have Green Point system installed in your house.

To learn more about IGH please visit https://www.greenpointsys.com
